info.title: Change Record User Status
info.description: This service allows you to read all change record user status. The operation can be used to find, for example, change records user status with its user status text in all languages or as per logon language.

x-sap-shortText: Reads all change record user status with its text in the system

values.text: Product Lifecycle Management - Change Record Integration(SAP_COM_0339)
[Engineering Change Management with Change Records(1NF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NF " Link To BP ")
[Product Change Management with Change Records - Process Industries(5QC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5QC " Link To BP ")
[Product Change Mgmt with Change Records - Discrete Industries(64E)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/64E " Link To BP ")
